fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Scout out a player, performing an Investigator (35) check on them and seeing who they visit.
-Weaken a player’s defenses, dropping it by 1 tier for that night, to a minimum of Vulnerable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Attacks made by the Warfleet against Scouted targets cannot be redirected or otherwise changed to target a different player. (they can still be roleblocked or fail via defense)
-Your Scouting ability is Astral.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
-Weakening defenses now drops a player’s Defense to None, or Vulnerable if their Defense is already None.
-You may Scout two times in one night.
